name: scholarship-finder-backend
description: Backend API for Scholarship Finder System

scripts.seed: node -e "const seedDatabase = require('./seeds'); const mongoose = require('mongoose'); const dotenv = require('dotenv'); dotenv.config(); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/scholarship_finder').then(async () => { await seedDatabase(); process.exit(0); });"

author: Student
